publishes.name: content-delivery.planned
publishes.summary: Event represents the delivery method is chosen and ready to be processed.

markdown.content:
The Dispatcher is a QubeWire subsystem that deals with the planning of content delivery – which delivery method is to be used in the delivery of which content to a theatre, and when it should be sent.

- It supports delivery of content (characterized as a list of CPLs / DCPs) to a specified theatre on or before a given deadline.

- It supports the following delivery methods:

  - Partner Delivery – characterized by download to a QW Appliance followed by duplication and shipping via a specific option (three-day, one-day, same-day etc.)

  - Theatre Delivery – characterized by downloading into a QW Theatre Appliance (TAP) and TMS notification and ingestion (if the TMS is supported)

  - Satellite Delivery – characterized by a handoff of content to a satellite operator and integration with their proprietary system for status updates.

<NodeGraph />
